concepts.title: DNA as the genetic makeup of all life
concepts.body: DNA (deoxyribonucleic acid) serves as the fundamental genetic material for all known living organisms and many viruses, carrying the instructions for development, functioning, growth, and reproduction.

concepts.title: RNA as the genetic makeup of all life
concepts.body: RNA (ribonucleic acid) serves as the fundamental genetic material for all known living organisms and many viruses, carrying the instructions for development, functioning, growth, and reproduction.
